page.title: 12Keeping fit in Linwood
page.content: In 1983,Linwood became the only place in Britain to have daily P.E for the Primary 6&7 children in Linwood Primary Schools.We have carried out a survey to find what the P.E teachers, the Primary School teachers and the children involved think about this project.One P.E teacher thought that daily P.E. was a good idea because it makes the pupils fitter,they learn new activities and get to know the High School teachers.All the children asked,liked daily P.E.They thought it made them fitter and helped with sport and other work.Some children thought it was a test.Over the past year we have played unihoc,benchball,tennis and learned to orienteer.We have also done gymnastics,swimming and dancing. Most of the children enjoyed taking part.
